summary: Adds Ravens in Skyrim and Solstheim !!!
descriptionHtml:
Adds 100 flying Ravens in many places like Windhelm,Falkreath,Riverwood,Winterhold,Tundra etc...

Skyrim is the land of Nords but without the Sacred Bird of the North it dosnt feels good this mods adds 100 carefully placed Ravens in all Skyrim for immersion.

Dragonborn Dlc Edition Adds 12 Ravens in Solstheim.

Ravens has 1-2 feathers of Hagraven inside them !!

Installation 
Simple drag and drop or via NMM.Incompability Meshes/critters/fchawk/fchawkgo.nif with Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM
You can remove this fchawkgo.nif if u want this mod its tested and Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM work with no problem.Special Thanks Qasiermo for models and textures.

Special Thanks Qasiermo for models and textures.
